title: Sweatshirt Is Wrong Size
body:
I recently went to Worlds at LA Staples Center and I purchased the $65 medium sweatshirt.  However, after returning home, I discovered that the mech store had given me a large instead. Now as a short asian male, I barely pass for a medium and am quite dissatisfied with this purchase as I distinctly remembered asking for a medium,  I know I should have checked the size at the purchase but I guess I just lost my head with the hype at worlds.

Is there any way that I can return this sweatshirt and get one at the medium size without additional chrage (like mailing or something).  Cuz I really wanted this sweatshirt to be something for me to wear  :/

Please help, if I am to write this to a different forum or something, please tell me.

Thank You

replies.body: Add picture of you drowning in said shirt and sad kawaii face for bonus points.

Oh no, that really sucks! (˵¯͒⌢͗¯͒˵)

We *may* be able to figure something out if you submit a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) about this, making sure to attach a picture of the hoodie and its tag, and reference this post in your ticket.

Let me know if you have any questions.
